description.text: This ring is made of hammered steel. If the wearer can cast summon monster spells, the wearer adds harbringers to the 3rd-level list of monsters he can summon with those spells, adds legion archon to the 6th-level list, and adds shield archon to the 7th-level list. Also, once per day on command the wearer can use this ring to summon a harbinger, as if by the summon monster III spell.
